name: Delivery Options
description:
PAYPAL will automatically add our standard $12 delivery. If your order is going to one of the following areas outside Squamish, you must select one of the following additional delivery fees otherwise your order will not be processed.

Option Details:
1) Squamish - $12 (included in paypal checkout process)
Includes: Squamish Downtown. Valleycliff, Dentville, Garibaldi Highlands, Garibaldi Estates & Brackendale.

2) Britannia Beach - $25

3) Furry Creek -$25

4) Squamish Valley - $25

5) Paradise Valley - $25

6) Whistler (Door to door)* - $30; Mon-Fri only, orders must be received before 3pm the previous day. Flowers must be OK to leave or have recipient at home. All apartments/condo deliveries will be contacted before delivery to ensure our driver can deliver.

7) Whistler Hotels -  $30 *Monday-Friday Delivery Only

name: Christmas Wild Bouquet
description:
A loosely arranged trendy bouquet made up of protea, berries, holiday evergreens and many other textural unusual flowers and foliages. All wrapped in a beautiful presentation of burlap or woven paper.

All products are made with the seasons best selection. We strive to make each bouquet as similar as possible to the photo however based on availability there may be variations.

name: Stylish Holiday
description:
A modern version of the traditional red and green, this beautiful full arrangement provides a festive palette with a modern twist. Rich red roses, carns and gerberas nestle among the evergreens and tropical green anthuriums.

All of our bouquets are made with the "season's best" assortment of flowers and foliage to look as similar to the product pictured as possible. Please click here for our substitution policy.

name: Ever Living Planter
description: This arrangement is an ever lasting arrangement using real wood such as birch, cork, grapewood or driftwood. It is accented with twigs, mosses and ever lasting succulents. This arrangement is a perfect option for creating a sense of life and greenery in a room with little or no light or the perfect gift for someone who is away a lot. Each size we offer is made in a slightly different container and the overall look will be unique each time based on the natural forms of the wood.

name: Festive Centerpiece
description:
A Billies Favourite, this bowl style table centerpiece looks amazing as the main attraction on a holiday table or as a side table arrangement. A candle brings light to the holidays and festive baubles bring shine and celebration. 

All of our bouquets are made with the "season's best" assortment of flowers and foliage to look as similar to the product pictured as possible. Please click here for our substitution policy.

name: Rustic Holiday Centerpiece
description:
A rustic ceramic pot will be a keepsake for years to come. Here it holds a high quality beautiful candle amongst overflowing evergreens fragrant with the holiday season. Roses, eucalyptus, magnolia leaves and soft silvery foliage complete this elegant wintery centerpiece.
All of our bouquets are made with the "season's best" assortment of flowers and foliage to look as similar to the product pictured as possible. Please click here for our substitution policy.

name: Round Terrarium
description: A best seller! Terrariums are the new “thing” in home design, a modern vintage style that brings life and beauty to the home or office. A round fishbowl holds a selection of ferns, moss and tropical plants for any home or office. Includes care instructions (which are very simple!) and a coloured stones or shells.  Please note deluxe and premium sizes come in larger, different style pots.

name: Florist's Choice
description:

The base price is for a hand tied bouquet. 
The second price is for a larger hand tied bouquet.
The third price is for a bouquet in a vase at medium size.
The fourth prices is a bouquet in a vase at a medium-large size.
The fifth price is a spectacular vase arrangement with that real "wow" factor!

name: Wallflower Living Plant Frame
description:
These are the perfect gift for the plant lover, or even those who don't know how to care for plants! A simple resevoir has a visual indicator when it needs water. This frame has either a white, lime green or bamboo wood finish and availability is based on what we currently have in stock.
A perfect contemporary gift for all ages.

Made from 100% recycled plastic water bottles, Pockets are soft-sided, breathable, modular and infectiously fun!

name: Succulent in Glass
description:
A best seller! This is the perfect gift for someone who has it all! This modern cube holds a contemporary layered selection of rocks, stones and sand and an easy care succulent plant, creating a simple, modern style for any home or office. Includes care instructions (which are very simple!) and a message stone. Please note deluxe and premium sizes come in larger, different style glass.
This arrangement includes a message stone. If you have a message preference please make sure to leave a note during the checkout process. We offer "Imagine", "Dream", "Love", "Family", "Gratitude" or "Abundance" options.

name: Plush Toy
description:
Add on a gorgeous fair trade felt animal to your order. Some of the animals available are: lambs, elephants, penguins, alligators, monkeys, cats, polar bears. Sorry, we will choose the most appropriate animal and can't guarantee your choice.

May not be exactly as pictured. Based on availability. Felt Elephant: These loveable, cuddly stuffies brim with personality! Handmade from 100% natural fibers, these adorable friends are sure to capture a child's imagination: They are also handmade by women in Nepal, providing them fair wages and livelihood. Straight from their hands to your heart!

name: Chocolate Truffles Box or Bag
description:
These delicious Canadian fresh made chocolate enrobed nuts or truffles come packaged in an elegant chocolate brown box with a gold ribbon or in an elegant pouch in cream and espresso tones. We've personally sampled each variety and can vouch for their quality and deliciousness!

Also available: Chocolate Fondue set for 2. Very romantic for instant fondue!
